name: The Last Walking-Simulator
description:
[[ Warning!! Strobing Lights ]] 

Created for the A2B2 Game jam (theme: CORRUPTION)

This is a very simple walking simulator. 

--- Controls ---

Esc: Pause/ Quit/ View Controls

 Tab/Backspace: Place save point/ Recall to save point 

WASD/ Mouse: Move/ Look

Ctrl: Crouch

Space: Jump

Shift: Walk Faster

V: Laugh

Project was made by me in UE5 using the Lyra Starter Game for animations.  Huge credit to Talking Drum Games for their Knight from the UE market. Also, shoutout to Tornelli on Youtube for their "Lyra Walking/Clean Start" video.  I recommend plugging in laptops as this might be graphically intensive, especially when initially loading.  (820 MB unzipped)
